name: Brownie
description: Small humanoid creatures wearing all brown clothing who sneak into homes at night to help with household chores.

name: Beastie
description: A type of cuddly beast who is inherently less helpful and more mischievous.

name: Gorad
description: A giant furry beast. Usually found by its sound which is a human-like cackling laugh.

name: Simocca
description: A fierce lion-like creature that gorges on mocca-mixes. Its apetite for coffee is only satiated by the occasional furry animal.
